cafe.image.meta

Class Metadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • cafe.image.meta.Metadata
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Comment, Exif, ICCProfile, ImageMetadata, IPTC, IRB, XMP

    public abstract class Metadata
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for image metadata.
    Version:
    1.0 01/12/2015
    Author:
    Wen Yu, yuwen_66@yahoo.com
